data.comment: The big names in today's match at Estadio dos Arcos have now been confirmed.
The first-half is under way at Estadio dos Arcos - Rio Ave kick-off to start the match.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Maritimo at Estadio dos Arcos.
Maritimo to take a throw-in in Rio Ave territory.
Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Maritimo in the half of Rio Ave.
Throw-in Maritimo.
Throw-in for Rio Ave in their own half.
In the minute 6, Corner awarded to Maritimo.
Maritimo attack but Zainadine Junior's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Rio Ave at Estadio dos Arcos.
In the minute 6, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Gustavo Correia signals a free kick to Maritimo.
Rio Ave have been awarded a corner by Gustavo Correia.
In the minute 8, Rio Ave push forward at Estadio dos Arcos and Tarantini gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Maritimo defence.
Rio Ave have been awarded a corner by Gustavo Correia.
Ball goes out of play for a Maritimo goal kick.
In the minute 10, Free kick in a good position for Maritimo!
Maritimo needs to be cautious. Rio Ave have an attacking throw-in.
Rio Ave pushes forward through Tarantini, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 11, Rio Ave drives forward and Gelson Dala gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Rio Ave.
Ball safe as Maritimo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 12, Free kick for Maritimo in the half of Rio Ave.
Toni Borevkovic (Rio Ave) has received a first yellow card.
Rodrigo Pinho of Maritimo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 14, Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Diego Lopes.
Carlos Mane instrumental with a fine assist.
In Vila do Conde a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 17, Rio Ave awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Rio Ave have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
In the minute 19, Gustavo Correia signals a Maritimo throw-in in Rio Ave's half.
Gustavo Correia awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Rio Ave get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Maritimo's half?
In the minute 22, It's a goal kick for the away team in Vila do Conde.
Throw-in for Rio Ave in the half of Maritimo.
Rio Ave to take a throw-in in Maritimo territory.
In the minute 24, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Vila do Conde Rio Ave attack through Tarantini. The finish is off target, however.
Maritimo have a goal kick.
In the minute 25, Free kick Maritimo.
Throw-in Rio Ave.
Gustavo Correia signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
In the minute 26, Can Maritimo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rio Ave's half?
Throw-in for Rio Ave at Estadio dos Arcos.
Free kick Maritimo.
In the minute 29, Rio Ave are caught offside.
Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
Gustavo Correia awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 31, Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gustavo Correia signals a free kick to Rio Ave in their own half.
Free kick for Maritimo in their own half.
In the minute 34, Rio Ave drive forward but Andre Pereira is judged offside.
Gustavo Correia signals a Rio Ave throw-in in Maritimo's half.
Can Maritimo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rio Ave's half?
In the minute 36, Gustavo Correia signals a free kick to Maritimo.
Tarantini (Rio Ave) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Corner awarded to Maritimo.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Maritimo close to the penalty box.
Maritimo advance rapidly upfield but Gustavo Correia blows for offside.
Ball safe as Maritimo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 39, In Vila do Conde a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Rio Ave in their own half.
Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, It's a goal kick for the home team in Vila do Conde.
Free kick for Maritimo in the half of Rio Ave.
Goal kick for Rio Ave at Estadio dos Arcos.
In the minute 43, Gustavo Correia signals a free kick to Rio Ave.
Zainadine Junior is booked for the away team.
Rio Ave awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 44, Free kick Maritimo.
Throw-in for Rio Ave at Estadio dos Arcos.
Gustavo Correia signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Gustavo Correia blows to start the second-half. Maritimo with the kick-off.
Gustavo Correia signals a free kick to Rio Ave in their own half.
In the minute 48, Free kick for Rio Ave in their own half.
Gustavo Correia awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Rio Ave.
Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, Joel (Maritimo) nets with a header to make it 1-1 at Estadio dos Arcos.
That's a fine assist from Rodrigo Pinho.
In the minute 52, Can Rio Ave capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Rio Ave's Diego Lopes gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Maritimo goal kick.
In the minute 54, Maritimo are whistled for offside.
Maritimo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Maritimo in their own half.
In the minute 57, In Vila do Conde Maritimo drive forward through Rodrigo Pinho. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rio Ave's Andre Pereira is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 59, Diego Lopes of Rio Ave smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In Vila do Conde, Rio Ave push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Ball safe as Maritimo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 61, Maritimo have been awarded a corner by Gustavo Correia.
Free kick for Rio Ave in their own half.
Free kick for Maritimo in the half of Rio Ave.
In the minute 63, Maritimo's Joel misses with an attempt on goal.
Gustavo Correia awards Rio Ave a goal kick.
Joel puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 1-2.
In the minute 63, Jean Irmer with an assist there.
Bruno Moreira is replacing Andre Pereira for the home team.
Mario Silva (Rio Ave) is making a first substitution, with Nikola Jambor replacing Tarantini.
In the minute 66, Gustavo Correia signals a Rio Ave throw-in in Maritimo's half.
Can Rio Ave capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Maritimo's half?
Rio Ave have been awarded a corner by Gustavo Correia.
In the minute 67, Gustavo Correia signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
Rio Ave's Pele has been booked in Vila do Conde.
Important block from the Maritimo defence as Nikola Jambor fires in a strike for Rio Ave.
In the minute 68, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Rio Ave to take a throw-in in Maritimo territory.
Throw-in for Rio Ave in the half of Maritimo.
Corner awarded to Maritimo.
Goal kick for Rio Ave at Estadio dos Arcos.
In the minute 71, Lucas Africo is replacing Rene for Maritimo at Estadio dos Arcos.
In the minute 72, Gustavo Correia signals a Rio Ave throw-in in Maritimo's half.
Gustavo Correia awards Maritimo a goal kick.
Rodrigo Pinho (Maritimo) shoots – and rattles the crossbar!
In the minute 73, Gustavo Correia signals a throw-in for Rio Ave, close to Maritimo's area.
Can Rio Ave get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Maritimo's half?
The home team have replaced Ivo Pinto with Chico Geraldes. This is the third substitution made today by Mario Silva.
In the minute 74, The home team replace Diego Lopes with Gabrielzinho.
Rio Ave to take a throw-in in Maritimo territory.
Great finish from Marcelo Hermes to give Maritimo a 1-3 lead.
In the minute 76, Milton Mendes is making the team's second substitution at Estadio dos Arcos with Edgar Costa replacing Rafik Guitane.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Gustavo Correia awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Rio Ave in their own half.
Throw-in for Maritimo at Estadio dos Arcos.
Corner awarded to Maritimo.
In the minute 81, Maritimo surge into the attack at Estadio dos Arcos but Rodrigo Pinho’s header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vila do Conde.
Maritimo have a goal kick.
In the minute 83, Throw-in Maritimo.
Rio Ave's Chico Geraldes is on target but unsuccessful.
Maritimo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Maritimo in the half of Rio Ave.
Rio Ave awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 88, Gustavo Correia signals a free kick to Maritimo in their own half.
Ryotaro Meshino is on a sub for Pele for Rio Ave.
Maritimo make their third substitution with Milson replacing Rodrigo Pinho.
The away team have replaced Marcelo Hermes with Fabio China. This is the fourth substitution made today by Milton Mendes.
Maritimo to take a throw-in in Rio Ave territory.
Free kick for Rio Ave in their own half.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
In Vila do Conde a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Rio Ave in the half of Maritimo.
Rio Ave's Chico Geraldes gets in a shot on goal at Estadio dos Arcos. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Gustavo Correia signals a Maritimo throw-in in Rio Ave's half.
Ball safe as Rio Ave is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Maritimo in their own half.
It's 1-3 as the referee blows for full-time.
Jean Irmer for Maritimo has been booked by Gustavo Correia and receives a first yellow card.
